title: Taiwan places Islands ads in U.S. papers
description: Taiwan authorities placed full-page advertisements in four major U.S. newspapers Wednesday to protest Japan’s “nationalization” of the Diaoyu Islands in the East China Sea, according to media reports.
cleanContent:
Taiwan advertises Diaoyu claims in major U.S. newspapers

By Mei Jingya, Sina EnglishTaiwan authorities placed full-page advertisements in four major U.S. newspapers Wednesday to protest Japan’s “nationalization” of the Diaoyu Islands in the East China Sea, according to media reports.The color advertisements appeared in The New York Times, The Washington Post, The Wall Street Journal and Los Angeles Times respectively.The ads say Taiwan has "carefully reviewed" Japan's “sovereignty claims” over the islands and found them to be "invalid" under international law, Kyodo said. | |
